doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 12 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 3/24/1988]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 12 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 3/24/1988]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm, Phil Zwickler, Michael Petrelis, Philip Reed, and Tom Duane, sponsored by the Human Rights Campaign Fund2.Discussion about research team Masters and Johnson who is working on a spermicide that would kill HIV3.Discussion about the Arts Council funding LGBT art projectsCOMMERCIAL:The World:Benefit AIDS Resource Center4. Interview with Michael Petrelis who led a delegation of activists to various states during primary elections called, Freedom Ride5.Tom Duane talks about Housing Rights of LGBT peopleCOMMERCIAL:Night of 1,000 Gowns6.Al [Hears],video artist at Gay Cable Network dies of AIDS, Andy Humm reflects upon his activismCOMMERCIAL:The "A" Party Line7.News Watch, The U.S Office of Personnel Management announces AIDS policy that prohibits discrimination against employees with AIDS8.Vermont Bill addresses housing discrimination against LGBT people9.Boulder, CO lesbian wins approval to adopt a child10.Spotlight on Lesbians, Interview with author Karla JayCOMMERCIAL:The Party Line for Men11.Lavender Health, Interview with Dr. Barbara Warren director of Project Connect12.Closing CreditsCOMMERCIAL:The "A" Party LineCOMMERCIAL:Gay Cable Network show, "Be My Guest" with Sybil Ophthalmia BruncheonCOMMERCIAL:Men's Party Line
The Right Stuff:1.Naming Names, criticism against The New York Post's negative article on the New York State Council on the Arts, which funded LGBT art projectsCOMMERCIAL:Village Pointe Condos2.Razor Sharp talks about the closing of NYC club, The SaintCOMMERCIAL:The Party Line for Men3.Media Watch, Interview with Larry Kadish, Curator of the Film Department at MOMA talks about the film festival, New Directors/New Films
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 12 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 3/24/1988]: March 1988
